placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Hôtel qui n’est pas fait pour les voyageurs qui souhaitent faire des excursions…
Attention aux estomacs fragiles
text:
Avis mitigé sur cet hôtel.

J’ai séjourné 8 jours dans cet établissement et plusieurs points négatifs sont à signaler :
	•	Le buffet ne respecte pas toujours la chaîne du froid, ce qui est préoccupant. Cela nous a malheureusement valu une intoxication alimentaire, nous obligeant à passer une journée entière cloués au lit.
	•	L’offre “all inclusive” est très limitée : seulement 4 cocktails et 5 boissons sans alcool inclus. Pour des cocktails classiques comme mojito ou piña colada, il faut payer en supplément.
	•	L’hôtel est situé très loin des principaux lieux d’excursion : il faut souvent se lever à 4h du matin pour participer aux activités.
	•	Bien que la mer soit proche, la baignade y est interdite en raison des fortes vagues, ce qui est assez frustrant.

Cela étant dit, l’hôtel reste agréable si vous souhaitez principalement vous reposer et profiter du calme sans chercher à beaucoup visiter.
Le personnel est globalement souriant et accueillant, à l’exception du Monsieur de l’accueil Dananjaya qui s’est permis de couper nos bracelets “all inclusive” en plein après-midi, devant tout le monde, alors que notre départ n’était prévu que plusieurs heures plus tard (18h).
Par ailleurs, aucune chambre de courtoisie n’est proposée avant le départ, seulement des douches publiques dont la propreté laisse à désirer côté hommes, sans serviettes mises à disposition.

Enfin, un grand merci à la représentante Ôclub, très professionnelle et à l’écoute, qui a fait de son mieux pour rendre notre séjour plus agréable malgré ces désagréments.
title: Hôtel pas digne d’un 5 étoiles

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
Checked in today not a happy camper
Hotel said that because we only had one name on the booking ie I had booked the room in my name and not both me and my husbands name they could not accept the booking and insisted that we cancel with booking.com and rebook with them
Clearly this was a guise to prevent Booking.com charging them commission on our booking
Hotel said that they would waive the cancellation fee.
To add insult to injury they then attempted to  Overcharge us by pretending we were getting a better deal until we realised that they were charging us in US dollars which added over 600 Aussie dollars to the bill Travelling with another couple it leaves a very bad taste in the mouth before we have even unpacked For the record the hotel is tired and just to make my husbands day he advised me that the gym has 5 main machines of which 3 are under repair as well as dirty glasses for the water supplied and no hand towels available It certainly seems a poorly run hotel that likes to charge in American dollars. We are here for another 4 days which we wish we weren’t Booking.com has yet again overrated this as an excellent place.  It has a vibe about it      Avoid
title: Unhappy Campers

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,
Greetings from Pandanus Beach Resort & Spa!

We regret & apologies the inconvenience occurred in your stay as per your review to the Tripadvisor. 

As you are aware the sea of the south west coast was completely rough as per the Meteorology Department reports in Sri Lanka and all of us were experiencing the same with heavy winds due to the aforementioned scenario. Hence, we couldn't use the rooftop entertainment area which we have notified to our In-house guests. 

Our staff made ensure regular cleaning of the rooms. You should have mentioned your concerns to the room boy or the management. So that we could take immediate action to make your stay  comfortable.

The food quality we were maintaining with about 100+ guests and not a single guests raised any concerns about spiciness of the food, food quality and food varieties. We always give big spread with different varieties including Traditional food corner with other international dishes.

We regret that you have not raised your concerns before your departure or during your stay to the staff to resolve your concerns and for you to enjoy your holiday at our hotel. Even in your Guest Satisfaction Card mentioned all good.

We appreciate you visiting our hotel and leaving a valuable comment. We always try our best to give the perfect service to our clients. Hope to see you again. 

Best Regards,
Team Pandanus.
placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
Notre avis quand au séjour dans cette hôtel est vraiment mitigé (début mai 2024).

Points positifs :

L’hôtel est relativement beau. Les lits sont grands et les chambres assez spacieuses.

La piscine est très belle et offre une belle longueur pour nager. 

Les couchers de soleils sont vraiment agréables en soirée.

Le personnel reste très gentil et très accueillant. 

Des tuk-tuks sont présents en permanence devant l’hôtel pour vous emmener à droite à gauche et leurs tarifs sont honnêtes. Des excursions assez onéreuses sont proposées par l’hôtel (il n’y a pas grand chose à faire autour de l’hôtel sinon).

Points négatifs :

Au moment ou j’écris cet avis, la plage est devenu inexistante. Ne vous fiez donc pas aux photos de l’hôtel. Il n’y a plus du tout de plage et la mer vient frappé un peu plus chaque nuit les bords de l’hôtel. C’est vraiment à se demander quand jusque quand est-ce que ça va tenir. 3 palmiers sont tombés en une nuit durant notre séjour. Sans compter ce qu’il y a en guise de sable (des sacs de sacs de plastiques pour tenter de limiter les dégâts et de nombreux déchets..). 

Pour un hôtel de cette gamme, aucun réelle animation interne à l’hôtel n’est proposé si ce n’est du volet dans la piscine, un billard (payant même en all inclusive) et des fléchettes. On s’attend à plus de choses pour un 5*….

La propreté des chambres laisse vraiment à désirer. Même si les chambres sont plutôt belles, notre spa/baignoire était très sale. Nous ne l’avons même pas utilisé.

Le bruit dans cet hôtel est également un point négatif. Les chambres étant très mal isolées et l’hôtel en bord de route, on entend chaque klaxon et chaque voiture qui passe toutes les nuits.

La nourriture est peu variée et très épicée. Pour un pays ou les fruits sont très présents, nous n’avons eu droit qu’à de la pastèque et de l’ananas pendant 5 jours.

Ayant séjourné dans deux gammes de chambres, nous n’avons pas compris pourquoi les chambres haut de gamme avaient droits à une légère couverture et celles bas de gamme à de simples draps. 

La terrasse du rooftop était fermé durant tout notre séjour donc nous n’avons pas pu en profiter. Ouvert seulement le samedi et nous partions le vendredi. L’accueil vous dit que vous pouvez demander l’ouverture de celui-ci mais en réalité la terrasse est vide car les chaises et tables sont toutes empilées, ce qui est très dommage vu la belle vue de l’hôtel. Cet endroit devrait être ouvert tous les jours.

Nous sommes un peu déçu de ce dernier hôtel dans lequel nous étions censé profiter pour la fin de notre séjour. En réalité, nous avons préférés les autres hôtels que nous avons faits qui étaient pourtant des 3 ou 4*.
title: Correct mais décevant

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: Отдых был оплачен за 4 месяца до приезда в этот отель. После 10ч полета и 4 часов езды до отеля с развозом всех пассажиров- мы добрались до отеля и нам сообщают НАШЕЙ БРОНИ НЕТ. Выяснилось что локальный тревел менеджер от КОНЕЧНО ЖЕ- библиоглобуса не передала наше бронирование)) полагаю, схема отработанная, ведь когда мы спустя два часа непрерывных звонков- нас перевезли в другой отель Echo Serf. А там уже оказалось- были в списках отеля. Отдых был испорчен в самом начале. БИБЛИОГЛОБУС, вопросы к вам!!! Схема, то рабочая, судя по всему, потому что переселили нас в отель класса ниже.
title: ОБМАН

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: Отель Панданус бронировали за три месяца, оплатили полностью, прилетели 31.01.24г.В автобусе, по пути из аэропорта, гид сообщил, что мы не едем в Панданус, т к. нет свободных номеров для нас. Сказал, что повезут в отель Танжерин, примерно в 30-40минутах дальше по побережью. Всё таки настояли заехать в Панданус, навстречу выбежал персонал отеля , мол простите-извините, но идите отсюда. Привезли в Танжерин, подарили обеды, хорошо встретили. Но там не оказалось пляжа, от слова совсем. Его смыло несколько лет назад. Нашли отельного гида от Анекса, некую Марианну. То ещё существо! Путём длительного разбирательства, добились перевода, на следующий день, в отель Клуб Бентота. Там и провели оставшиеся дни отдыха.В дальнейшем узнали, что для Пандануса , такое поведение-норма. Да и в целом для Шри-Ланки, со слов тех же гидов. Существо Марианна нами больше не интересовалось, даже при случайных встречах и не сообщило туроператору, где мы поселились. Нас потом искали при отъезде.
title: Как мы посмотрели на Панданус из окна автобуса

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Выбрать другой отель в Бентоте
text:
Что же, пишу как есть! 
Купили мы в Библио-Глобусе тур в этот отель... прилетели, и оказалось что данный отель забит и мест нет. 
Библио-глобус говорит что это отель жулики, т.к. продают мест больше чем номеров,  отель говорит что это все библио-глобус... но как итог, в оплаченный нами отель мы так и не попали. 

Будте готовы, что покупая тур в этот отель, можете остаться без отеля. Вот вам и сервис.... 

По поводу пляжа, приезжали, смотрели.... пляж худший во всей Бентоте т.к. сразу глубоко и круто. 
Номера "супериор" очень плохие. Вы будете в отдельном корпусе на задворках. Лежаков ужасно не хватает, не пришли рано утром - лежите на земле :((( 

В общем, в этот отель не рекомендую ехать.
title: Overbooking forever

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
От аэропорта до отеля ехали около 3 часов. Приехали в 17:00,отдали документы на ресепшн и ожидали около 20 минут. В отеле идут ремонтные работы,белят потолки,красят стены,везде расставлены стремянки,приходится в согнутом виде через них проползать. 
Номер дали на первом этаже,ничего особенного,одна кровать большая,диван,шкаф с пару вешалками,радует что в душе есть и холодная и горячая вода. Дают шампунь,гель для душа и мыло,но не каждый день. Туалетную бумагу не считают нужным приносить. Полотенца забирают утром и потом приносят только к вечеру. Захотите в обед обмыться,будете ходить мокрым. 
Пляж: всегда волны,купаться невозможно. Мы уходим к камням влево,там они не такие сильные,но  там есть пена в которой не очень приятно плавать. 
С погодой не очень повезло. Каждый день вечером идёт дождь. Из 9 дней 4 дня днём не было солнца и тоже шел дождь.
Еда: брали завтрак и ужин. На завтрак яйца,сосиски,овощи,бывает мясо,но оно жесткое и не вкусное. Из фруктов ананас, папайя и арбуз. Чай,кофе и пару видов сока. На ужин картошка,рис,мясное блюдо (курица или говядина-но острова то),пару раз давали морепродукты под соусом. Так же фрукты и сладости. 
Очень сильно напрягает то что пристают с экскурсиями местные жители,просят телефон,хочешь сделать фото,а они встают рядом и пристально смотрят. Лежишь на лежаке,встанут напротив тебя и тоже стоят смотрят. Предлагают купить то картины,то специи...
В отеле очень много немцев. Включали музыку на море,к нам подошли и попросили отключить. Потому что они читают и мы им мешаем. Вечером на баре та же самая история. Приходят и говорят что они ложатся спать в 9 вечера,а мы тут будим их. 
Больше всего не понравилось отношение отельных работников к отдыхающим. Когда покупали у них пиво,они все улыбались,разговаривали на русском,а как только пришли с алкоголем купленным из соседнего кафе,нам сказали что нужно за это заплатить либо идти пить в номер. Нашу просьбу вернуть нам деньги за оставшиеся дни отдыха (чтобы сменить отель) тоже проигнорировали.
Вообще расположение отеля ужасное. Чтобы поехать на экскурсию,всё далеко. Например экскурсия Элла: до водопада Равана 4 часа езды,9-ти арочный мост 2.5 часа. 
Если поеду ещё на Шри-Ланка то точно не в этот отель.
title: Pandanus отель

Mooie ligging prachtig zicht. Lekker eten meestal vriendelijke bediening.
Maar zeer vuil in het oude gedeelte  
rook er  muf geen handdoeken .op de kamer .... Geen goede all in lang wachten op drankjes 's avonds soms drie keer bestellen  ... Het land en de uitstappen met Ruhan maakten alles goed . placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
Из плюсов - отличное, разнообразное питание и доброжелательный, отзывчивый персонал.
Отель старенький, потасканный. В номерах довольно просторно, есть всё необходимое. Будьте осторожны с сушилкой на балконе - в местах креплений проступает ржавчина, сохнущая одежда может быть испорчена. Не слишком удобные матрасы и подушки, которые, к тому же, попахивают сыростью. В душе плохо уходит вода, соответственно, на полу всегда лужа. Кондиционер не регулировался и был очень шумным. Невероятно грязные шторы. Уборка в номерах посредственная. Постоянно не хватало полотенец - во время уборки их забирали, а новых клали не полный комплект или не клали вовсе. Воды давали бесплатно 2 бутылки по 0,5 л в день - и это на двух взрослых человек! Кулера нигде нет, жлобство(((
На пляже всем хватало лежаков, но они также старые, тяжёлые, деревянные. Матрасы на время дождя не уносили, просто складывали, чтобы с них стекала вода, но они все равно промокали внутри(((  На пляж каждый день приходят местные продавалы-приставалы: с экскурсиями, массажем, кокосами, какими-то благовониями. Две женщины трясли своими тряпками по доллару, раскладывая их прямо на земле🙈 Также приходил мужчина с несчастной голодной обезьянкой, коброй и питоном. По всему побережью также бегают собаки (неагрессивные), пасутся коровы. Мусор повсюду, его убирают только на той части пляжа, которая относится к отелю, но и то не слишком тщательно. Песок на пляже в черных разводах - горючее, наверное. С обуви до конца так и не отмылось.
Возле отеля пойти особо некуда - кафешки и ресторанчики перемежаются отелями, заброшенными и нет. За всеми покупками - в Бентоту, 1-2$ на тук-туке туда-обратно. Советую не покупать чай и специи в сувенирных лавках, куда вас будут усиленно зазывать - цены там завышены. Прекрасный выбор в супермаркете Небула.   Алкоголь только отдельно продается, в специальных алко-маркетах, ну и фрукты в лавках (торгуйтесь, цен там нет).
Алко-маркет, кстати, есть в пяти минутах от отеля пешком по дороге направо, в сторону Галле, но выбор там меньше, чем в Бентоте.
Итог - не рекомендую.
title: Октябрь 2023

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: I organized a bride to be party at Pandanus  Beach Resort Hotel on 08.10.2023. We organized this event before my sister's wedding as a gift to her. But on that day, as we had hoped, the opportunity did not materialize happily. Hospitality, friendly chat food cleanliness nothing found in this hotel. It was said and shown that there was hair in the food, but no one responsible was even kind enough to express regret about it. The place had not been prepared. No table and chairs were arranged.  There were no cutlery. Food is not covered. When we told the food and beverage manager about the flies are in the food, he was told to tell us a proper way to drive the flies away.  He tried to cover up his mistake by arguing with the guests. It was said that location chargers would charge extra money after the party started. Even on the day we went to pay the advance, we were not informed about it. As we were told that the decorations are not done by the hotel, we got them from outside on hire basis. we told the head chef, that we would bring a cake. Then he agreed to everything. The management of this hotel doesn't even know that taking photos at a function is normal. We have attended events even in star class hotels with higher than this hotel. We have experienced high acceptance, high service there. But the employees of this hotel are not aware of any customs. Everyone should be given training in hotel hospitality. The F & B manager does not even know the order in which to talk to the guests. If he can be freed from the responsibility that he does not know about this, there is no point in him being in that position. The chief manager was not even given a chance to speak to complain about the above. Therefore. Had to inform like this.   it must be said that this hotel, which made my sisters in high positions in the society uncomfortable, is not a suitable hotel for such event .
title: Poor Service

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: I celebrated my bride to be party at this hotel. before do the advance payment , we have clearly mentioned that this is will be a bride to be party and there are will be decorations and photographers. they agreed with us and promised to us they will charge only for food (high tea) also we asked from the chef Ranjith if there are any known decorations people please let know us and after a week he called to my brother and said that he could not find anyone. but when we went to the party chef said he dont know this is a bride ti be party and they are saying we should pay for location also. if we want to pay they should give their rates but didnt. when we went to see hotel at the Frist time thru didnt tell anything like this . they told you can take photos anywhere at any time between 3-6 pm. and also their food also sooo dirty . in a fish bun there were a hair and so many flies all over the food. when we tell about the flies to f&d he is asking what will they do for flies and asking solutions from us. what a joke??? they dont have any qualifications or any experiences how to be clean didnt put any spoon or fork to take the foods and pick the foods . so disgusting. when we show the fish bun which had a hair, a waiter took and went but no any replied or anything . there were no any general manager to complain about the foods and dirty. and the f & d manager dont respect to customers . please dont go such a like this Place , dont waste your money at this kind of dirty place .
title: Foods with Flies

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: No quiero pensar como serán los otros hoteles si este está bien puntuado.  Hemos pasado 5 días en Sri y hemos estado en hoteles buenos como el Amaya lake    Aquí las habitaciones  muy justas.  El bufet para olvidar. En fin opiniones para todo los gustos pero no está al nivel de otros ni por asomo

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
Very disappointed in the service offered by the staff at Pandanus Beach Resort and Spa. I visited the restaurant on 13 March 2023 with my two friends. Upon entering the venue, we were told that the restuarant will not be serving food for orders placed after 9:30 PM. However, when we placed the order it was 9:10 PM. At the time when we were placing the order, the staff didn't refuse to take our order. 

After placing the order and waiting for over an hour, the staff refused to serve our food and did not even inform us about it. The chef and the GM also refused to give a reasonable explanation. Judging by the way we were treated, it's safe to assume that they treat local gusests with a certain negative attitude. I myself is an employee at a reputed hotel in Sri Lanka, and I constantly strive to serve any and all guests I receive with utmost respect. 

Based on how we were treated, I do not recommend this restuarant to any one who wants to grab a quick bite or a meal. Especially if you are a local, do not expect to get a good service here.
title: 3 local boys went to have dinner and were refused because we are Sri Lankans

Thanks

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text: Checked in Yesterday( 27 Feb 2021), worst experience ever. 🤐Doesn't worth the price. Weekend Buffet is very basic comparing to other 4* Hotels offering much lower prices these days.Booked 2 deluxe rooms for Rs. 18k for double & 22k for triple. We arrived at the hotel at 4pm where the check-in time is 2pm and the rooms weren't ready and took another 40 mins to prepare the rooms. 🤐👎. After a while we had to shift to another room due to a power failure in the room.One water bottle they've given to us, has already been used by Rats 🐀. Room balcony is with full of dust. Although The staff is very friendly and the Deluxe rooms are very spacious. But overall experience is very disappointing and Total waste of our money and our  time.
title: Total Disappointment 👎

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
text:
I and my wife visited this place in second week of April of 2019. We were enjoying the pool and had kept the door keys next to the bench. After sometime, we were unable to find the keys so we asked the hotel team to look into the issue. However, the manager started blaming us for losing the keys and started asking for 7500 as payment. We asked them to check cctv footage’s etc but got no help. Upon our checkout, he again harassed us for the payment which seemed unreasonable. He kept citing their company policy for justifying 7500 payment. I insisted on seeing that document which mentions charges of 7500 for loss of keys. He said he couldn’t find the document and will share on my email address. I am writing this review just shy of a year as I was hoping to get their policy document which they promised to send us. But I never received one. Seems it was arbitrary amount of 7500 which was damn too high.

The point is, in a hospitality business, instead of being friendly and reasonable to the customers, the approach was to extract money out of customers. They didn’t hesitate creating a scene at the checkout and being rude about their demand. Anyways, we proved that the keys were lost in their hotel premises (near pool) and they are equally responsible if someone (guest/employee) has picked it up intentionally or by mistake. 

Never ever going to this hotel. Spoiled the entire Sri Lanka experience for me.
title: Horrible experience - felt like getting cheated

placeInfo/address: Colombo - Galle Main Rd Yalegama, Bentota 80510 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Dont book this hotel
text:
I stayed at Pandanus Resort for 2 nights i.e. 29th and 30th September. Had the most terrible experience there.

Positives- Great location, the property is right at the beach. the view from all the rooms is breathtaking. The rooms were spacious and clean.That is it. There is nothing else I could tell positive beyond it. 

Negatives- Let me start from the moment we reached the hotel. We enter this big gloomy lobby. It was very unattractive and dimly lighted. We waited for 15 mins for the rooms to be allocated. 
1) Requested the staff at the counter to give a room on the ground floor since my parents were old. The response was a plain NO. So we had to settle for the rooms they gave us.
2) Requested the the room service twice to send coffee sachets for the rooms. Even after repeated calls nobody ever came.
3) In the restaurant during breakfast, requested the F & B staff to get a tea, he directed me to the tea counter and refused to get it.
4) During dinner buffet, went to the barbeque counter and requested for a chicken piece, Nobody every came to my table
5) Next night at dinner, my mother was around the desserts counter when one of the staff asked her, what she wanted to have and she said an ice cream which he said would get it to our table. Nobody ever came even after waiting for 15 minutes.
6) We were about to leave for the site seeing when it started raining heavily. I went to the lobby and requested the gentleman for an umbrella. The answer was expected ''NO SIR, we don't have umbrellas''. I remembered that there were umbrellas in our rooms provided by the hotel. I requested them to send them to send someone to get it and again the answer was the same. "NO, we cant do it''
7)The day we were leaving at the lobby i requested for a bottle of water and i was flabbergasted by the response when i was told that we cant give you a bottle of water. They did not even say that it was going to be chargeable. They said we cant get you a water bottle. 
Most disgusting hotel i have ever been to, please please dont spoil your holidays  by  booking this place.
title: Terrible experience, expect only one response from them "NO'' to every request

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Mr. Holliday,

Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your stay at the Mermaid Hotel. We truly regret that your experience did not meet your expectations, and we appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns.

We take cleanliness and guest comfort very seriously. Our housekeeping team ensures that all towels, sunbeds, and rooms meet high hygiene standards. If there were any issues upon your arrival, we sincerely apologize and would have been happy to resolve them immediately had we been informed.

Regarding noise levels, we strive to balance entertainment and guest comfort. Our live music, which many guests enjoy, is scheduled to end by 11:00 PM. We regret any inconvenience this may have caused and would have gladly arranged for a quieter room had we been notified.

The beach adjacent to our hotel is public, and while we do not control external vendors, our team is always available to assist guests in navigating such situations.

We understand your concerns about dining hygiene and can assure you that all food is prepared according to ISO standards. We regret if your experience did not reflect this and appreciate your feedback as we continuously strive to improve.

It is disappointing to hear that you chose to shorten your stay. We would have been happy to explore alternative arrangements to enhance your experience. Nonetheless, we sincerely value your feedback and would love the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. As a gesture of goodwill, we would be pleased to offer a special arrangement should you decide to visit again.

Please do not hesitate to reach out if you would like to discuss this further.

Best regards,

Thomas Rodrigo

roomTip: Avoid awful hotel
text:
Where to start 
This is the worst hotel we have ever stayed in. I have travelled the world for the last 35yrs and never have I ever stayed in such an awful hotel 
The worst was the noise from the live band playing every night . It was so loud it sounded like the band were in our room. 
The room was dirty and need a complete re vamp. 
The pool beds were so dirty they were covered with white sheets to hide the stains . 
The beach is covered in rubbish and you are accosted from touts as soon as you step onto the beach . 
You can’t walk to any restaurants or bars from the hotel and especially not along the beach. 

The hotel offered to move us room, however it would not have solved the problems of this awful hotel, as you could hear the band form every part of this hotel, and the hotel would still be dirty and unclean . 

The hotel is dirty and not clean, staff un helpfully , breakfast is not covered up , so covered in flies . 

This hotel needs a completed refurbished and is NOT a 4 * star hotel 

This hotel was that awful we cut our holiday short and get a flight home early 

DO not stay here . 

I wish I could share a video of how bad the noise was 

AVOID avoid avoid avoid 
Avoid 

All the reviews that are good ( this is laughable 😂😂) on this hotel are from guests who have only ever written one review , I have reviewed many many places , this is not my first review .
title: WORST EVER HOTEL / do not stay here . AVOID

placeInfo/address: Mahawaskaduwa, Kalutara 12000 Sri Lanka
text:
This is an outdated 1960’s holiday camp on a beach which doesn’t have the golden sands as advertised. Rather it has steeply shelving black sand absolutely covered in litter and no swimming signs. There are many lovely beaches and hotels in Sri Lanka, but this isn’t one of them.

The large pool is nice and there have been some attempts to update the hotel, but the over decor is poor, a tired building including fire escapes with padlocks on and a “sports centre” that has definitely seen better days.

The food is ok and the staff are pleasant and it’s not their fault the hotel is run down. As mentioned by others they constantly ask for Tripadvisor reviews.

Oh and if you want to go to bed before 11, don’t bother as the music blares out til then with every room close to the band.

There is nothing in the immediate vicinity of the hotel except and train line running past the front gate!!
title: Poor Quality Holiday Camp

Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced. Please allow me to address your concerns.

Firstly, regarding the absence of bottled water in your room, our hotel has made a conscious decision to reduce plastic waste and support environmental sustainability. Upon arrival, we inform our guests that water dispensers are available in the corridors, and flasks are provided for your convenience. We apologize if this information was not clearly communicated to you.

We regret to hear about the issues with the hot water, room odor, air conditioning, and the broken bathroom door. It is our standard procedure to address any reported issues promptly. Unfortunately, it seems these concerns were not reported to our management during your stay, preventing us from taking immediate action to resolve them.

We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be pleasant and enjoyed the outside view. However, we regret that the food did not meet your expectations entirely. Your feedback regarding the breakfast pastries will be shared with our culinary team to ensure improvements are made.

We strive to provide the best possible experience for our guests, and your feedback is invaluable in helping us achieve that goal. We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you better in the future.

Sincerely,

Thomas Rodrigo

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Valued Travelers,

Kindly note that above reviewer stayed for 21 days with us. During their stay there were no complains of any of these issues they raised above but on the last day of their stay and at very last minute prior to the departure they were trying to claim the hotel for missing currency from their room. There was no clear evidence of the accusation and also there were providing different statements which were with lot of suspects. On their departure day no one from our hotel team has entered to the room that they stayed and after careful investigation it was confirmed. We offered police assistance but denied.
If you refer many positive reviews we have in the TripAdvisor page and other review pages you will have a good understanding and judgment of our property and my justification on this 02 reviews. Also we have won TripAdvisor 'Best of the Best "exclusive award for last 04 years and that explains our service level.

text:
Booked and paid for all inclusive, that's not what we've got. Wine is not included, that should be made clear when you book not after you check in. When you book all inclusive that's what you expect to get.
Room  unsatisfactory, first we had problems with the safe then with a leaking toilet. Then the toilet didn't flush. Turns out whoever fixed the leak didn't turn the water back on. Guy who came to sort it out seemed to think we should have known this. Given a different room, no help moving our bags. Problems with door and safe, eventually sorted but another hour or so wasted. Meant to be a tranquil hotel, it's not. The music is so loud in the bar that it's impossible to sit and have a drink and you can't even get away from the noise in your room as it's so loud. The previous hotels we have stayed in on our tour of Sri lanka have been lovely the same cannot be said for the Mermaid
title: Disappointing

placeInfo/address: Mahawaskaduwa, Kalutara 12000 Sri Lanka
text:
Considering this was our quarantine hotel, we would expect top security right? Me and mum were so delighted to be there for our one and half week quarantine period, as their food tasted delicious, all so fresh and their staff also were very friendly. However one day my AirPods from under the pillow went missing which put me into real stress and anxiety. After informing the management and getting an answer like “our staff are loyal and would not do this, please recheck on your side”, made me realise I should have picked a better hotel. I checked again and demanded them to carry on a search at their staff quarters, which they did and told me that there was nothing found. I come back from my next meal to then find my AirPods right under the pillow! So clearly the person has been so meticulous and smart about it and replaced it back as soon as they knew I was not giving up. Please be careful with your valuables!! 
Everything else was perfect though.. from the pool, beach, the food etc
title: Please keep your stuff safe!

ownerResponse/text:

text: It was the worst experience as a family. We went for a day out on 20th November 2022.  A few of us were wearing swimming attire and swimming hijab in the pool, suddenly recreation manager came and informed us to remove the swimming hijab and he mentioned that it is not a five-star hotel standard. I am also a hotelier and I informed him there is no such five-star hotel standard in Sri Lanka. And he was forcing us to remove the hijab and we told him to bring the rules and regulations book. And he told us, will bring the details and he didn't return back. As a Sri Lankan it was an experience in my life. I won't recommend this hotel.
title: Worst Experience

placeInfo/address: Mahawaskaduwa, Kalutara 12000 Sri Lanka
text:
We arrived at the Mermaid hotel at the end of our tour around Sri Lanka for a rest before returning home. We were looking forward to the beach and pool and after a long 8 hour journey from Eliya with a couple of stops along the way finally arrived at this hotel. 
First impression was slightly depressing as we waited a while for service at reception (we were always welcomed immediately at our other stops). 
We were shown to our room past a bleak looking, dirty ‘pond’ that looked like it needed a good clean, then down a long twisting corridor of empty water coolers and tired looking tiles with dirty grout.
The room we were given smelled of damp which we worked out came from the air conditioning. The bathroom was ok but had a mouldy basket that was empty of any complementary’s other than one soap and a shower hat. I have included photos of the other issues in the room. It was ratty, forlorn and felt dirty.
We complained and were offered a better room which we took, although the door lock was broken and there was an old single bed dumped outside the room. Luckily our tour operator was great and got us out of there the next morning.
As well as the above the pool was slimy looking on the tiles, the gym and other amenities were deserted and some things out of order. 
The beach was another issue with local men hanging about at the fence hassling for ‘tours’ and generally being oppressive and slightly scary. 
We love dogs but there were dogs everywhere with litters of puppies so the hotel set off regular firecrackers to scare them away (which doesn’t work, but gives you a shock).
We couldn’t wait to get out and will never return.
title: Terrible

I must admit that the issues with the food varieties is quite an issue. However, this is not an excuse and we are acting on these issues immediately. Also kindly note that prices at the hotel are in line with other hotels of similar caliber as we carry similar costs and we deliver similar quality.

Your statements on our products and services are very helpful and we always find guest feedback indispensable to maintain our high quality and for continuous improvement. I do hope that this single stay did not permanently tarnish your perception of our resort and that you might reconsider a return visit and allow us to show the progress we have made in the areas you have kindly highlighted to our attention.

We wish you happy and peaceful 2020,

placeInfo/address: Mahawaskaduwa, Kalutara 12000 Sri Lanka
text:
Mermaid hotel
I do not see a reason why would somebody go to this hotel. I feel specifically cheated, because we paid 1300 usd for 3 nights halfboard around NYE. And the hotel is ugly outdated 3 star hotel. Even though they tried well on NYE buffet, otherwise the food was average at the best. Plus, zero choice on nonspicy dishes. Breakfast only till 9.30! How inappropriate in holiday resort! But the dinner would start first at 7.30 pm! 
Room - would be ok, deluxe with beach access, if at least they would have the mosquito nets on the balcony door (mind you, you can't open any window). With mosquitos present, we w forced to sleep in the closed very smelly room! There were terrible smell of the fumes in the room for whole night, probably from the traffic of nearby road. Plus the matrasses smell of piss. We came late first night, than was the NYE and we simply did not have energy to move to another room offered, which was on the 3rd floor anyway so no access to the beach. And i suspected the fumes would be present anyway.
Beach and sea - there were waves at the sea, but it was not too strong, still our 5 y old daughter was scared to bath. Even worse, the water was muddy colour, probably from nearby river (Kalu means black river!) Otherwise the beach looked nice, yellow sand and palms.
Pool - there was nothing appaling on non shaded rectangular outdated pool. Even not enough of umbrellas around. Water was warm. 
All and all quite unpleasant and shockingly expensive stay for what you've got. 
The staff was ok, the best job did housekeeping with cleaning our room very nicely everyday.
title: No reason to visit this place

Dear All Viewers,

This reviewer was using the privilege of posting a comment to express his frustration on charging of damages to the property assets, we confirm that pool light damage was not an accident but it was a deliberate attempt which was done by the reviewer’s children even after requested twice by the pool attendant not to remove the globe lights as there will be a safety risk and might cause damage to the light cover. This was confirmed by the other guests who were nearby and CCTV footage also confirmed that it was not an accident. 

Apart from the above, we could not find any solid evidence for his other concerns except one more damage in the room where he spent 03 nights with his family. Therefore we conclude that this was a vengeance attempt against our property and we kindly request you to review other postings to have a better understanding of our property. 
         
With best regards,
Dayan Ganegoda.

text:
As my previous review has been deleted,once again I would like to share my bad experience in Mermaid Resort.
We have stayed there for 3 nights The moment we step into our Deluxe Room the room phone found to be out of service which you can’t call the reception or the room service . This take them nearly  24 hours to get resolved.Also, the bathtub faucet was broken ( only hot water available) 
Once the phone it got fixed we realized that the room service is very poor as it takes ages to have what you need.  
Our dining experience was not so bad.However, the waiters over there are extremely busy to the extend that nobody can entertain you “ simply help your self “ they may need to increase few staff to cover the requirements of the guests . 

On top of that, one of the light post cover at the pool area was originally cracked and glued, the moment my 6 yrs old son touched it , same has been fallen and got more damaged,on spot, the Hotel GM reach to us and instead of asking about the safety and condition of my son, he immediately informed us that we have to pay for the light cover replacement imposing $20 .
I hope this time they will get the light replaced .
title: Not Recommended for Family Stay
